definition: mature male of various mammals (especially deer or antelope), to jump vertically, with legs stiff and back arched
details:
noun
- mature male of various mammals (especially deer or antelope)
- a framework for holding wood that is being sawed
= synonyms: horse, sawhorse, sawbuck
- a gymnastic horse without pommels and with one end elongated
= synonyms: vaulting horse, long horse
- a piece of paper money worth one dollar
= synonyms: clam, dollar, dollar bill
verb
- to jump vertically, with legs stiff and back arched
= example: to jump vertically, with legs stiff and back arched
= synonyms: jerk
- to move quickly and violently
= example: to move quickly and violently
= synonyms: shoot
- to resist or not comply
= example: to resist or not comply
= synonyms: go against
- to strive with determination
= example: to strive with determination
